name: Space Escape (durandhollis)
description:
Final form of the 2D Platformer project for CAS 117 made by Alex Durand-Hollis. 

Modification 1) Is a complete redo of the music with it being composed by me in the Medly app. 

Modification 2) Is a custom level two with added doors, and rooms to access. 

Modification 3) Is color changes to UI, backgrounds as the levels increase, and the pause screen. 

Credits to Brian and Declan for the tutorial videos.
